channel.title: Valve games mimimize when clicking on them in main menu of those game
channel.description:
Hi,
Something odd.
Lately the Valve games automatically minimize to taskbar when I click on it when I'm on the main menu, except HL2
Tried Singularity aswell, no problems at all
Somebody?
Thanks!

item.dc:creator: Dragunov2
item.description:
RedEye:

I’d be willing to bet money that Windows 10 is your issue along with immature drivers for same.

It would also be helpful if you post your system specs when reporting issues.

  • Intel Core i7 4770k
  • 8GB RAM
  • 780Ti 3GB, latest driver
  • Windows 10 Pro latest Fast Insider Build

item.title: Valve games mimimize when clicking on them in main menu of those game
item.dc:creator: LordDz
item.description:
Dragunov2:

They Always played well in full screen and just some games using the latest engine are minimizing to taskbar.

e.g. Half Life 2 and Black Mesa Mod play well, but Black Mesa Retail and Portal 2 just keep minimizing, not able to play it.

I tried Windowed mode, that worked, but I wonder if there is some kind of update done so this games have those bug now

Running latest version of Windows 10 Insider Fat Ring and Steam Beta

Well -windowed -noborder and you have both fullscreen and tab friendly… Source games really are a bitch when it comes to tabbing.
